TopicTitle: Task bar in front of game

Articles.Content:
Our school has 17 licenses. We just installed them on PCs with Windows 10.  The task bar is in front of the game. Our school tech support cannot fix that and suggested I contact KSP tech support.

Can you help me get a fullscreen window?

Thanks, Laurie

Alt+Enter fullscreens most applications.

Have you tried the main menu options? Under graphics, you can set it to fullscreen or windowed.

Another work around, would be to set the task bar to auto hide mode, it'll drop away as long as your mouse isn't down there.

First of all, KSP in school =

 

And as for your answer, a common issue with Windows is that some sort of input lock appears on the taskbar. Simple solution - restart Explorer.exe (Called "Windows Explorer" near the bottom of Task Manager) and ensure KSP is in fullscreen mode (as RocketInMyPocket said).
